price: (50) And they will not be able [to give] any instruction, nor to their people can they return.
arabic: فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ تَوۡصِيَةٗ وَلَآ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: falā yastaṭīʿūna tawṣiyatan walā ilā ahlihim yarjiʿūna
